content: अवसक्थिका [अवबद्धे सक्थिनी यस्यां कप्] {@--1@} A cloth girt round the legs and knees (by a person), when sitting on his hams; also, the act of girding round this cloth, or the posture itself; शयानः प्रौढपादश्च कृत्वा चैवावसक्थिकाम् <ls>Ms. 4. 112</ls>; अहिना अवसक्थिकाबंधहेतुभूतेन <ls>Malli.</ls> on <ls>Ki. 12. 22.</ls> {@--2@} (Hence) A wrapper, a girth or band in general.
